data.rationale:
the module is not a serious one so i have put it in Acme::* to
    reflect that. it may have some uses to some people (such as me, to
    make a chatterbot seem more realistic), the name Tpyo is in fact a
    Typo of Typo, it was chosen on purpose to be funny.
